questions.question: What is JavaScript?
options: A programming language for creating web pages
A markup language for structuring web content
A style sheet language for designing web pages
A database language for storing web data

questions.question: Which of the following are valid ways to declare a variable in JavaScript? (Select all that apply)
What is the correct way to write a comment in JavaScript?
What is the result of the following expression: 5 + "3"?
Write a JavaScript code snippet to print the message "Hello, world!" to the console.
What is the difference between == and === in JavaScript?
questions.correct_answer: == checks for equality in value, while === checks for equality in both value and type.

questions.question: What is a function in JavaScript?
questions.correct_answer: A function is a block of code that performs a specific task.

questions.question: How do you create an array in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the `document.getElementById()` method in JavaScript?
questions.correct_answer: It is used to get a reference to an HTML element by its ID.
